title: Classic Margherita Pizza
instructions: Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden.
Garnish with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Combine flour, baking soda and salt in small bowl.
Beat butter, sugars and vanilla in large mixer bowl.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well.
Drop by rounded tablespoon onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown.
